attributes.action: LET THE BRITISH PEOPLE KNOW THAT CHERIE BLAIRS FRIENDS ARE PROPOSING THAT SHE BE INSTATED AS A PEER IN THE HOUSE OF LORDS AGAINST THE WISHES OF THE BRITISH PUBLIC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE DO NOT FEEL THAT THIS PERSON IS WORTHY OF THIS TITLE

rejection.details: Cherie Blair has not been offered any honour.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
